subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A talent influx on offense, combined with new offensive coordinator Norv Turner and the wisdom of veteran Trent Dilfer, have helped push away the fog that hovered over quarterback Alex Smith last season.
snippet: A talent influx on offense, combined with new offensive coordinator Norv Turner and the wisdom of veteran Trent Dilfer, have helped push away the fog that hovered over quarterback Alex Smith last season.
